title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5900.4 - Hours and location for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5900.4 - Hours and location for public inspection

State Regulations

Requests for public access to records shall be accepted and
records produced on any workday at the office of the foundation, 99 Washington

Avenue, Albany, NY 12210. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5900.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
